column4: hello, network manager doesnot connect wifi automatically network when i logon. if I do 'sudo iwconfig eth1  essid myessid' it connects after some time. what should I do to correct this?
Did you go in and check the settings?  Sometimes I have to go in and tell it to automatically connect
It is always advisable to check the network settings after you set up the network
There should be a checkbox that enables "automatically connect"
